0: The hotel is quite a way out of town but has some wonderful views across the valleys below
Two double beds in the rooms
20 minutes away from Petra but situated on the slopes makes the view greater
The rooms are partly renovated unfortunately we had an old shabby room caught
Translated by Google Regular we had problem with the bathroom water two days the kindness of the director was to give us a bottle of mineral water
Carpeting stained bathrooms moldy cigarette burns in bedding hair in carpeting also was locked in room without telephone service
The rooms were small dirty and the bathrooms could do with a good cleaning
Also while trying to make tea we had to move furniture to find the plug and discovered a pile of dust which did not say much about the attention to details of housekeeping
Other than the comfortable beds and clean rooms there is very little that can redeem this hotel and the fault is squarely on the management
A positive note was that we had rooms with connecting doors but it was very clear that during our visit 3 nights to cleaning was done between those doors while it was obvious it was needed
1: Very simple rooms it is a 3 star in a beautiful building
Beautiful location the views are stunning
There are good views across the valley
It is a beautiful and large hotel with a fantastic view and a perfect serviceOriginalفندق جميل وكبير وفيه مطل رائع وخدمه مثاليه
Quiet nice view far away from the hustle bustle
Nice hotel and very clean room friendly housekeeping staff
The room is clean in addition to the excellent room service
Great views room food and service
